title: The Kingdom of Socks
description: Little John is trying to solve a mystery. The number of his socks has plummeted! Who or what is behind that? His old forgetful granny? Their loud, stomping washing machine? Or is it somehow connected to the weird noise coming from his wardrobe? After a series of inexplicable events, he starts questioning the soundness of his mind. Will he succeed to unravel the mystery? What stories will he tell his grandchildren one day? What stories would socks tell us if they could speak? Let us find out!
author: Karlo Repar
